text: Dameli is a Dardic language spoken by around 5,000 people in Chitral District.http://www.diva-portal.org/smash/get/diva2:651418/FULLTEXT02.pdf It is primarily spoken in the town of Domel where the name of the language comes from. ==References== Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Dardic languages Category:Chitral District
title: Dameli language
